name: Tree Climber
description:
This is our entry for TO Jam: Hindsight is 2020.

The theme of the jam this year is Together but Apart.

The point of the game is to get to the other player's starting branch. There are goats in the branches that that the player must avoid. If one player touches a goat, both players restart. The time stops when both players reach their respective goal.

The goal of the game is to see which team of players can complete this course the fastest.

This game is in prototype stage and has a fair share of bugs. We did it more as a learning project and it was great fun. Thank you to the TO Jam organizers for putting on the jam virtually.

This game was created by Jeffrey Wong (programmer) and Gloria Bwalya (graphics).
